title: buff taric or i quit
body:
it's been like 4 years since you've even touched him, he's a tanky paladin healer which is what I want to play in this game, pls make him better, make his stun op again make his heal really disgusting, make his buffs plentiful and make his ult do crazy damage. thanks.

edit: 24 hours until I uninstall the league client

replies.body: See you in a week then.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=mK0RUYEQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-27T03:17:28.466+0000)
>
> See you in a week then.

tomorrow*
